name: Devil Shark
description: The Devil Shark is a monstrous, gargantuan creature characterized by its formidable size and menacing demeanor. It possesses a robust body adapted for aquatic life, featuring sharp teeth and a streamlined form that enhances its predatory capabilities.
memorable: Its unique abilities like Blood Frenzy, Magic Resistance, and the ability to swallow prey make the Devil Shark a terrifying foe in water.
goals: Typically hunts for weaker prey, dominating its underwater territory and ambushing adventurers.
relations: Can command other sharks using Shark Telepathy, creating a potential hunting pack.
environment: Primarily found in deep ocean waters, thriving in aquatic environments.
strengths: Exceptional strength and constitution, high hit points, unique abilities that enhance combat effectiveness.
weaknesses: Lacks movement on land, making it vulnerable outside of water.
attacks: Uses powerful Bite attacks, grappling foes and has the ability to Swallow them, dealing additional acid damage while restrained.
most_powerful_ability: Freezing Breath, a cone attack that can potentially deal massive cold damage and control the battlefield.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet and a high passive perception of 20, allowing it to detect creatures without needing sight.
skills: Shows proficiency in Intimidation and high Perception, demonstrating abilities to instill fear and remain aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Immune to cold damage and resistant to fire damage.
Can only breathe underwater, limiting its versatility.
Gains advantage on melee attacks against weakened foes with Blood Frenzy.
Telepaths with other sharks for coordination in hunting.
Capable of swallowing multiple creatures at once, incapacitating them.
test_queries: gargantuan predatory shark with freezing breath
devil shark that swallows creatures whole
aquatic monster with keen smell and magic resistance
formidable predator found in deep ocean
monster that commands other sharks telepathically
